content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. As a landlord eager to secure the highest possible rent for my property, let's begin our negotiations with a proposed price of 1500 Euro per month. Please consider the prime location and excellent amenities near the apartment before countering my offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price. However, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a student with limited income, this rental price is beyond my affordability.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
